metadata.title: CVE-2024-4032 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The “ipaddress” module contained incorrect information about whethercertain IPv4 and IPv6 addresses were designated as “globally reachable” or“private”. This affected the is_private and is_global properties of theipaddress.IPv4Address, ipaddress.IPv4Network, ipaddress.IPv6Address, andipaddress.IPv6Network classes, where values wouldn’t be returned inaccordance with the latest information from the IANA Special-PurposeAddress Registries. CPython 3.12.4 and 3.13.0a6 contain updated informationfrom these registries and thus have the intended behavior.

criterions.comment: python3.5 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
